title: Quick mince hotpot
ingredients: ['drizzle olive oil', '400g beef mince', '1 carrot, finely chopped', '1 handful frozen peas', '6 mushrooms, sliced', '1 onion, finely chopped', '2 to 3 tablespoons beef gravy granules', '300ml boiling water', '8 new potatoes', '50g to 100g grated cheese of your choice (optional)']
